long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. In 2006, then-US defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld , speaking in Tunis, praised the country's evolution. What they have done it seems to me is move from a colony in 50 years-- a relatively short period of time-- to a democratic country that in different areas is moving at a different pace, he said.
